item.title: Portfolio of Logos and Icons
item.description: This is a collection of the logos and icons, I created (and used/not drafts) during the last years. Open-Sea Open Sea is a dead game project I was working on: Simple pixel art. Stylistic and minimalistic text. Simple icon similar to the graphics in the game. Redox Redox is an operating-system I work on. The icon was one of the first things I contributed to Redox (before code):
